gui.form.base

Interface FormObjectWithChildren

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DropDownMenu, ListBox

    public interface FormObjectWithChildren
    Interface for FormObjects that have children
    Author:
    group11

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FormObject getClickedChild()
      A function to return a focused child after clicking on this FormObject.
      FormObject getFirstChild() 
      FormObject getFocusedChild()
      A function to return a focused child.
      FormObject getLastChild() 
      boolean hasChildren() 
      void unfocusChildren()
      Unfocuses all the children.

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstChild

        FormObject getFirstChild()
        Returns:
        the first child

      • getLastChild

        FormObject getLastChild()
        Returns:
        the last child

      • hasChildren

        boolean hasChildren()
        Returns:
        true if this FormObject has children, false otherwise

      • getClickedChild

        FormObject getClickedChild()
        A function to return a focused child after clicking on this FormObject.
        Returns:
        The child to focus after clicking, null if no such child exists.

      • unfocusChildren

        void unfocusChildren()
        Unfocuses all the children.

      • getFocusedChild

        FormObject getFocusedChild()
        A function to return a focused child.
        Returns:
        The child that is focused, null if so such child exists.
